import React, { Component } from "react"; class Student extends Component { render() { let { studentDetailInfo } = this.props;//== studentDetailInfo = this.props.studentDetailInfo // console.log(stt); return ( {this.props.stt + 1} {studentDetailInfo.studentId} {studentDetailInfo.studentName} {studentDetailInfo.studentAge} {studentDetailInfo.studentGender ? "Nam" : "Nữ"}
) } } export default Student
